property.name: Rules
property.value: {JOKERS CHANGE} 6 (When this creature attacks, you may switch this creature with a Jokers creature that costs 6 or less from your mana zone.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of a creature, you may put it instead. ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all creatures that have "blocker" from the revealed cards into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of cards in your opponent's graveyard and put them on the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent destroys one of their creatures. Then destroy one of your creatures. Your opponent discards a card from their hand. Then discard a card from your hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your other creatures are destroyed, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it. {LAST BURST} (When this creature is destroyed, you may cast its spell side for no cost.) TWINPACT ■ Each player chooses and destroys one of their creatures.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your other creatures are destroyed, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it. {LAST BURST} (When this creature is destroyed, you may cast its spell side for no cost.)

property.name: Rules2
property.value: ■ Each player chooses and destroys one of their creatures.
